apis.description: Gets the outcome results for users and outcomes in the specified context.

operations.notes: Gets the outcome results for users and outcomes in the specified context.

parameters.name: user_ids
parameters.description: If specified, only the users whose ids are given will be included in the results. it is an error to specify an id for a user who is not a student in the context

parameters.name: outcome_ids
parameters.description: If specified, only the outcomes whose ids are given will be included in the results. it is an error to specify an id for an outcome which is not linked to the context.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Specify additional collections to be side loaded with the result. "alignments" includes only the alignments referenced by the returned results. "outcomes.alignments" includes all alignments referenced by outcomes in the context.

apis.description:
Gets the outcome rollups for the users and outcomes in the specified
context.

operations.notes:
Gets the outcome rollups for the users and outcomes in the specified
context.

parameters.name: aggregate
parameters.description: If specified, instead of returning one rollup for each user, all the user rollups will be combined into one rollup for the course that will contain the average rollup score for each outcome.

parameters.name: user_ids
parameters.description: If specified, only the users whose ids are given will be included in the results or used in an aggregate result. it is an error to specify an id for a user who is not a student in the context

parameters.name: outcome_ids
parameters.description: If specified, only the outcomes whose ids are given will be included in the results. it is an error to specify an id for an outcome which is not linked to the context.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Specify additional collections to be side loaded with the result.

OutcomeResult.description: A student's result for an outcome

id.description: A unique identifier for this result

submitted_or_assessed_at.description: The datetime the resulting OutcomeResult was submitted at, or absent that, when it was assessed.

links.description: Unique identifiers of objects associated with this result

outcome.description: The id of the related outcome

score.description: The rollup score for the outcome, based on the student alignment scores related to the outcome. This could be null if the student has no related scores.

count.description: The number of alignment scores included in this rollup.

course.description: If an aggregate result was requested, the course field will be present Otherwise, the user and section field will be present (Optional) The id of the course that this rollup applies to

user.description: (Optional) The id of the user that this rollup applies to

section.description: (Optional) The id of the section the user is in

name.description: The name of the resource for this rollup. For example, the user name.

OutcomeAlignment.description: An asset aligned with this outcome

id.description: A unique identifier for this alignment

html_url.description: (Optional) A URL for details about this alignment

OutcomePath.description: The full path to an outcome

id.description: A unique identifier for this outcome

name.description: The title of the outcome or outcome group
